Materials: You require mercury, phosphorus, and powdered diamond and opal worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes.


Utility

  • You inscribe a harmful glyph on a surface (up to 10 ft. in diameter) or inside an object that can be closed to conceal it. If the inscribed object is moved more than 10 ft. from where you cast the spell, the glyph breaks and the spell ends without triggering.

  • The glyph is nearly invisible. A creature must succeed on an &reference[Intelligence (Investigation)] check against your spell save DC to notice it.

  • You decide the trigger when casting the spell (touching, stepping on, opening, moving within range, seeing, reading, etc.). Triggers can be refined by physical traits (size, weight, type) or by conditions such as passwords. You may also exclude certain creatures from triggering it.

  • Once triggered, the glyph glows, filling a 60 ft. radius sphere with dim light for 10 minutes. Each creature in the area when it activates, or that enters it for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there (but not both), is affected by the chosen effect.

  • Choose one of the options below for its effect.

Effects - 60 ft Radius

Trigger: Set the trigger to occur.

  • Death: [[/save CON]] Failure, target takes [[/damage 10d10 necrotic]] damage; success Half damage.

  • Discord: [[/save CON]] Failure, target bickers for 1 minute, cannot communicate meaningfully, and has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

  • Fear: [[/save WIS]] Failure, target is &reference[Frightened] for 1 minute, drops held items, and must move at least 30 ft. away each turn if able.

  • Hopelessness: [[/save CHA]] Failure, target is overwhelmed with despair for 1 minute and cannot attack or use harmful actions, spells, or effects.

  • Insanity: [[/save INT]] Failure, target is insane for 1 minute, cannot act or understand language, and speaks only gibberish. The DM controls its erratic movement.

  • Pain: [[/save CON]] Failure, target is &reference[Incapacitated] with excruciating pain for 1 minute.

  • Sleep: [[/save WIS]] Failure, target falls &reference[Unconscious] for 10 minutes. The creature wakes if it takes damage or if shaken awake as an Action.

  • Stunning: [[/save WIS]] Failure, target is &reference[Stunned] for 1 minute.
